com.viaoa.remote.multiplexer.io

Class RemoteBufferedOutputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • java.io.FilterOutputStream
        • com.viaoa.remote.multiplexer.io.RemoteBufferedOutputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class RemoteBufferedOutputStream
extends java.io.FilterOutputStream
    Customized from BufferedOutputStream, but uses a shared pool of buffers so that it does not have to create a new one each time. Also removed sync on methods, since this is only used by one thread at a time.
    Author:
    vvia

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RemoteBufferedOutputStream(java.io.OutputStream out)
      Creates a new buffered output stream to write data to the specified underlying output stream with the specified buffer size.
